amendatorysection.catchline: Motorboat; registration period already commenced; fee reduced; computation.
amendatorysection.para: In the event an application is made after the beginning of any registration period for registration of any vessel not previously registered by the applicant in this state, the license fee on such vessel shall be reduced by one thirty-sixth for each full month of the registration period already expired as of the date such vessel was acquired. The county treasurer or designated county official shall compute the registration fee on forms and pursuant to rules of the commission.
